snippet: As Tom Brady awaits the outcome of his latest appeal of his suspension, backup quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo said his preparation for the season remains unchanged....
lead_paragraph: As Tom Brady awaits the outcome of his latest appeal of his suspension, backup quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo said his preparation for the season remains unchanged.

headline.main: Garoppolo Focused on Preparation at Patriots Minicamp
headline.print_headline: Garoppolo Focused on Preparation at Patriots Minicamp
